ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Bertoxx Shadow Knight
ygData.msgSnippet: Even if you do take hits against Guards/Merchants, it s possible to fix without having to screw up your home guild fac. Go kill gnolls in Blackburrow...it
ygData.messageBody:
Even if you do take hits against Guards/Merchants, it's possible to fix
without having to screw up your home guild fac. Go kill gnolls in
Blackburrow...it raises those factions without hurting your other ones.
Also, tho I'm not sure how city guards would react to you, the Gnome Shadow
Knights are followers of Bertoxx as well and might welcome you as a kindred
soul. Watch your ankles tho.... :-)
----- Original Message -----
From: Enie <dawn_marie@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, March 28, 2003 10:24 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Bertoxx Shadow Knight


> Good Friday everybody,
>
> I have a level 9 Shadow Knight who worships Bertoxx. I have some of
> the components to do the Scourge Knight Armor Quest (found out that
> this is what the Klicnick Warrior bile sack and Decaying Skull is
> for). I have read that doing this quest can screw up faction with the
> Qeynos Guards. Is this true? I kinda enjoy being about to go to the
> Qeynos vendors above ground without being KOS :)
>
> Enie Erudite Enchanter/Quellious 12
> Lorlei Human Shadow Knight/Bertoxx 9
>
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
